about.name: Gayan Witharana
about.description: I'm a Experienced Senior Software Engineer with a Bachelor of Computer Science, currently working at a well reputed company in Sri Lanka who has more than 6 years of working history in computer software industry. I am a person with a passion for developing innovative systems that accelerates the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success.
about.descriptionMore: I'm a Experienced Senior Software Engineer with a Bachelor of Computer Science, currently working at a well reputed company in Sri Lanka who has more than 5 years of working history in computer software industry. I am a person with a passion for developing innovative systems that accelerates the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success.

education.school: University of Colombo School of Computing, Sri Lanka

projects.name: MTX
projects.description: A Business to Business application with an admin panel.

projects.name: Xforce
projects.description: AirWaves is a B2B (business to business) web based system for travel agents to book Cruise plus holiday packages with Cruise, Flights, Transfers and Hotels.

projects.name: Madthread - Singapore
projects.description: A subscription base web system and mobile application to facilitate renting and buying clothes.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: Reactjs, Node js, GraphQl, Mongodb, React-native, react hooks, redux, redux-thunk

projects.name: Automobile classifieds and cashoffer system - USA
projects.description: Classifieds facilitate users to showcase automobiles and receive cashoffer. This also includes inventory and co-part management as well as additional services such as transportation and safe-exchange.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: reactjs, redux, redux-thunk, redux-persist, reactive-search, .net core 2 - 2.2 serenity,  microservices architecture, rest web-api, react hooks, redux selectors, jest

projects.name: EGN Web App
projects.description: Web application that manages citizens data for Sri Lanka government. The application is based on micro service architecture.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: Php, lumen, Vue js, ecmascript-6, couchbase, webpack

projects.name: Agrinous Web App
projects.description: Web application that manages livestock sales in Australia same as the mobile application.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: Php, silex, reactjs, redux, redux-saga, ecmascript-6, couchbase

projects.name: Agrinous Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile application for real time processing of livestock sales in Australia. This application handles eid scanning with bluetooth technology to handle stock management, selling and delivery sections.

properties.label: technologies
properties.value: reactjs, react-native, redux, redux-saga, wix-react-native-navigation, ecmascript-6, redux selectors, jest, e2e testing, appium, couchbase-lite
